title: Zone-Level Access applications
description: Applications secured behind Cloudflare Access for a specific zone. (Note: We recommend using the equivalent account-level endpoints at https://api.cloudflare.com/#access-applications-properties. Account APIs provide a broader range of features and are backwards-compatible to zone APIs.)

links.title: List Access Applications
links.description: List all Access Applications in a zone.
links.response:
{

      "domain": "test.example.com/admin",
      "logo_url": "https://www.cloudflare.com/img/logo-web-badges/cf-logo-on-white-bg.svg",
      "app_launcher_visible": true,
      "session_duration": "24h",

}

links.title: Add a self-hosted application
links.description: Adds a self-hosted application to Access.

domain.description: The domain and path that Access will secure.

logo_url.description: The image URL for the logo shown in the App Launcher dashboard.

app_launcher_visible.description: Displays the application in the App Launcher.

session_duration.description: The amount of time that tokens issued for this application will be valid. Must be in the format `300ms` or `2h45m`. Valid time units are: ns, us (or Âµs), ms, s, m, h.

allowed_idps.description: The identity providers your users can select when connecting to this application. Defaults to all IdPs configured in your account.

items.description: The identity providers selected for application

auto_redirect_to_identity.description: When set to `true`, users skip the identity provider selection step during login. You must specify only one identity provider in allowed_idps.

enable_binding_cookie.description: Enables the binding cookie, which increases security against compromised authorization tokens and CSRF attacks.

custom_deny_message.description: The custom error message shown to a user when they are denied access to the application.

custom_deny_url.description: The custom URL a user is redirected to when they are denied access to the application.

http_only_cookie_attribute.description: Enables the HttpOnly cookie attribute, which increases security against XSS attacks.

same_site_cookie_attribute.description: Sets the SameSite cookie setting, which provides increased security against CSRF attacks.

allow_credentials.description: When set to `true`, includes credentials (cookies, authorization headers, or TLS client certificates) with requests.

max_age.description: The maximum number of seconds the results of a preflight request can be cached.

service_auth_401_redirect.description: Returns a 401 status code when the request is blocked by a Service Auth policy.

parameters.example:
{
  "type": "self_hosted",
  "name": "Admin Site",
  "domain": "test.example.com/admin",
  "logo_url": "https://www.cloudflare.com/img/logo-web-badges/cf-logo-on-white-bg.svg",
  "app_launcher_visible": true,
  "session_duration": "24h",
  "allowed_idps": [
    "699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252"
  ],
  "auto_redirect_to_identity": false,
  "enable_binding_cookie": false,
  "http_only_cookie_attribute": true,
  "same_site_cookie_attribute": "strict",
  "cors_headers": {
    "allowed_methods": [
      "GET"
    ],
    "allowed_origins": [
      "https://example.com"
    ],
    "allow_all_headers": true,
    "max_age": -1
  },
  "skip_interstitial": true,
  "service_auth_401_redirect": true
}

links.title: Add a SaaS application
links.description: Adds a new SaaS application to Access.
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/access/apps" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"saas","name":"Admin Site","logo_url":"https://www.cloudflare.com/img/logo-web-badges/cf-logo-on-white-bg.svg","app_launcher_visible":true,"saas_app":{"consumer_service_url":"https://example.com","sp_entity_id":"example unique name","public_key":"example unique name","idp_entity_id":"https://example.cloudflareaccess.com","name_id_format":"id","sso_endpoint":"https://example.cloudflareaccess.com/cdn-cgi/access/sso/saml/b3f58a2b414e0b51d45c8c2af26fccca0e27c63763c426fa52f98dcf0b3b3bfd","custom_attributes":{"name":"family_name","name_format":"urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:attrname-format:basic","source":{"name":"last_name"}},"created_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z","updated_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"},"allowed_idps":["699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252"],"auto_redirect_to_identity":false}'

logo_url.description: The image URL for the logo shown in the App Launcher dashboard.

app_launcher_visible.description: Displays the application in the App Launcher.

consumer_service_url.description: The service provider's endpoint that is responsible for receiving and parsing a SAML assertion.

sp_entity_id.description: A globally unique name for an identity or service provider.

public_key.description: The Access public certificate that will be used to verify your identity.

idp_entity_id.description: The unique identifier for your SaaS application.

name_id_format.description: The format of the name identifier sent to the SaaS application.

sso_endpoint.description: The endpoint where your SaaS application will send login requests.

name_format.description: A globally unique name for an identity or service provider.

name.description: The name of the IdP attribute.

allowed_idps.description: The identity providers your users can select when connecting to this application. Defaults to all IdPs configured in your account.

items.description: The identity providers selected for application

auto_redirect_to_identity.description: When set to `true`, users skip the identity provider selection step during login. You must specify only one identity provider in allowed_idps.

parameters.title: SaaS Application

links.title: Add a Bookmark application

app_launcher_visible.description: Displays the application in the App Launcher.

links.title: Update a VNC application

domain.description: The domain and path that Access will secure.

logo_url.description: The image URL for the logo shown in the App Launcher dashboard.

app_launcher_visible.description: Displays the application in the App Launcher.

session_duration.description: The amount of time that tokens issued for this application will be valid. Must be in the format `300ms` or `2h45m`. Valid time units are: ns, us (or Âµs), ms, s, m, h.

allowed_idps.description: The identity providers your users can select when connecting to this application. Defaults to all IdPs configured in your account.

items.description: The identity providers selected for application

auto_redirect_to_identity.description: When set to `true`, users skip the identity provider selection step during login. You must specify only one identity provider in allowed_idps.

enable_binding_cookie.description: Enables the binding cookie, which increases security against compromised authorization tokens and CSRF attacks.

custom_deny_message.description: The custom error message shown to a user when they are denied access to the application.

custom_deny_url.description: The custom URL a user is redirected to when they are denied access to the application.

http_only_cookie_attribute.description: Enables the HttpOnly cookie attribute, which increases security against XSS attacks.

same_site_cookie_attribute.description: Sets the SameSite cookie setting, which provides increased security against CSRF attacks.

allow_credentials.description: When set to `true`, includes credentials (cookies, authorization headers, or TLS client certificates) with requests.

max_age.description: The maximum number of seconds the results of a preflight request can be cached.

service_auth_401_redirect.description: Returns a 401 status code when the request is blocked by a Service Auth policy.

links.title: Update a SaaS application
links.description: Updates the configuration for a SaaS Access application.
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/access/apps/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"saas","name":"Admin Site","logo_url":"https://www.cloudflare.com/img/logo-web-badges/cf-logo-on-white-bg.svg","app_launcher_visible":true,"saas_app":{"consumer_service_url":"https://example.com","sp_entity_id":"example unique name","public_key":"example unique name","idp_entity_id":"https://example.cloudflareaccess.com","name_id_format":"id","sso_endpoint":"https://example.cloudflareaccess.com/cdn-cgi/access/sso/saml/b3f58a2b414e0b51d45c8c2af26fccca0e27c63763c426fa52f98dcf0b3b3bfd","custom_attributes":{"name":"family_name","name_format":"urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:attrname-format:basic","source":{"name":"last_name"}},"created_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z","updated_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"},"allowed_idps":["699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252"],"auto_redirect_to_identity":false}'

logo_url.description: The image URL for the logo shown in the App Launcher dashboard.

app_launcher_visible.description: Displays the application in the App Launcher.

consumer_service_url.description: The service provider's endpoint that is responsible for receiving and parsing a SAML assertion.

sp_entity_id.description: A globally unique name for an identity or service provider.

public_key.description: The Access public certificate that will be used to verify your identity.

idp_entity_id.description: The unique identifier for your SaaS application.

name_id_format.description: The format of the name identifier sent to the SaaS application.

sso_endpoint.description: The endpoint where your SaaS application will send login requests.

name_format.description: A globally unique name for an identity or service provider.

name.description: The name of the IdP attribute.

allowed_idps.description: The identity providers your users can select when connecting to this application. Defaults to all IdPs configured in your account.

items.description: The identity providers selected for application

auto_redirect_to_identity.description: When set to `true`, users skip the identity provider selection step during login. You must specify only one identity provider in allowed_idps.

object_definition.title: Zone-Level Access applications
object_definition.description: Applications secured behind Cloudflare Access for a specific zone. (Note: We recommend using the equivalent account-level endpoints at https://api.cloudflare.com/#access-applications-properties. Account APIs provide a broader range of features and are backwards-compatible to zone APIs.)
